Summary: one stationary solid red object, second flickering red object stationary then traveling northeast, increasing velocuty, both disappear
trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There was one other sighting in Fort Worth on or around October 3rd 2008
divs: sighting detailsnoticed a large, stationary red object almost directly overhead, high altitude, and and about 30 seconds later, noticed a smaller, flickering red object, also stationary, to the west of large object. smaller object began to slowly move to the east\northeast, slowly at first, but seemed to constantly increase its velocity. larger object then began to move east\northeast, slowly. lost sight of smaller(by now fast moving) object, and focused on larger object. larger object, still slowly moving east\ northeast appeared to distinguish illumination, never reappeared to our vantage point. also noticed unusually high air traffic during and after, obvious commercial\ military aircraft.
